alive from accident.

This video is hands down the biggest waste of money ever. There is nothing in this video of any benefit to anyone considering buying or living on a sailboat. Save yourself the money and just speak to someone who lives aboard and you will get more information than this pathetic video can provide. In fact, if it were criminal to sell a video this bad, it would be a felony to sell this DVD.
